descriptionHtml:
[color=#d5a6bd]
[/color][center][color=#d5a6bd][size=2]*I play Skyrim on a low-end laptop so I am not using any sort of ENB for a nice screenshot. 
If you can be so kind to provide some picturesque screenshot of Semira, I would be very much delighted! ^^
[/size]
[size=3]~(Screenshots from bodytypes other than CBBE is very, very much Appreciated!)~[/size][/color]
[color=#93c47d]
[size=4][b]=Description= [/b][/size][/color]
This Mod adds an original follower Rhea, a Daughter of Eldergleam Follower who is marriageable and can be found sleeping under the Eldergleam in [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Eldergleam_Sanctuary]Eldergleam Sanctuary[/url]. 
You will need Nettlebane to reach her, so you can only get her while (or after) doing [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/The_Blessings_of_Nature]The Blessings of Nature[/url] quest.
She starts with a roughspun tunic and no weapons, so do provide them for her if you plan to bring her along in your adventure. 

[color=#93c47d][size=4][b]=Changelog=[/b][/size][/color]
v1.1: Fixed Face texture path.
v1.0.1: Patch for Ugly Bronze Skin.
v1.0: Initial Release.
[b]
[color=#93c47d][size=4]=Stats=[/size][/color]
[/b]Gender: Female
Height: 0.97
Weight: 50
Race: Daughter of Eldergleam (Nord)
Voice: Female Young Eager
Body Type: CBBE /Sevenbase /UNP /7BO
Class: Spellsword
Proficiency: One-Handed, Heavy Armor, Restoration
Known Spells: Leaf Spray (Spriggan' special attack), Healing, Oakflesh, Paralyze
Location: Under the Eldergleam in Eldergleam Sanctuary (Can't miss it)
[color=#93c47d]
[size=4][b]=Requirements=[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url]
 (Prevents weird body mesh behavior & The ONLY reason for your game to CTD if you have this mod without it!)
[color=#93c47d]
[b][size=4]=Not Required but HIGHLY Recommended=[/size][/b][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Followers Tweak[/url]
(For many reasons...Check the mod page for more information)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO [/url]
(To make Rhea be more talkative instead of a soulless husk following you around)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My home is your home[/url]
(To set change her default location to somewhere else other than her original location, i.e Whiterun's Bannered Mare so you won't have any trouble finding her after being dismissed)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17483/?]Magical Markers[/url]
(Give this to her before dismissing her to know where she is after being dismissed)
[color=#93c47d]
[size=4][b]=Installation=[/b][/size][/color]
Drop all the files in Skyrim/Data folder

[color=#93c47d][size=4][b]=Conflicts & Bugs=[/b][/size][/color]
Should be none but may be possible with any mods that alters Eldergleam Sanctuary's interior.
[color=#93c47d]
[b][size=4]=Credits=
[/size][/b][/color][b]Ousnius and Caliente[/b] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- [/url][/center][center][b]MissShazira[/b] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42049/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42049/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42049/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42049/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42049/?]Porcelain Pale Vampire Skin For Females and Male[/url]
[b][b]THEHAG and BladeSinger06[/b] [/b] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30404/?]THEHAGs Privat Tattoos[/url]
[b]DD Akt[/b] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569]Univision Face[/url]
[b]tktk1 [/b]for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit
[/url][b]dimon99[/b] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
[b]Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity [/b]for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase body[/url]

author: ZReincarnation
